title: Rezolver .Net Core IServiceProvider implementation
description: Provides the implementation and extensions to use Rezolver containers in place of the standard Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection container(s)

packOptions.summary: Enables the use of a Rezolver container as the IOC container for Asp.Net Core applications.
packOptions.releaseNotes: Switched scope factory to use the IScopeFactory implementation of ResolveContext (new in 1.1.71702.500), which honours child scopes correctly.
